name: Dialy UI Kit | Free Mobile and Web Interface Design Kit
description:
Dialy UI Kit is an absolutely free and open-source User Interface Design Kit.

Now with Dialy, you can quickly prototype and transform your beautiful ideas into perfect UI components and UI screen designs. It includes 400+ ready-to-use components (cards, inputs, buttons, forms, and more.

You can use atoms if you want granular control over your designer or you can use molecules for quick UI prototyping.

I made all the components responsive using auto layout and also, there are multiple variants of every component to fill in all your requirements. But, I would highly encourage you to detach instances and customize components according to your needs.


Specs -

  • 400+ components
  • Atoms
  • Molecules
  • Multiple Variants
  • Responsive
  • Absolutely Free and Open-Source


Thank You


Download Full Version - www.dialyuikit.com
